name: Rose Custard
effect:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A dessert made from fermented milk. Once the milk is fermented and filtered into yogurt, stir sugar in before garnishing with dried roses and chopped nuts. In the beginning, this dish was only popular among adventurers and traveling merchants, but now, it is served as breakfast and a tea-time dessert across Sumeru.

suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A dessert made from fermented milk. It appears to be fine, but as soon as you try some... your teeth will quiver due to the unbearable acidity. The lack of seasoning can still be made up for by adding more sugar. However, that lingering sourness is hardly something that can be easily forgotten.

normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: A dessert made from fermented milk. Once the milk is fermented and filtered into yogurt, stir sugar in before garnishing with dried roses and chopped nuts. In the beginning, this dish was only popular among adventurers and traveling merchants, but now, it is served as breakfast and a tea-time dessert across Sumeru.

delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A dessert made from fermented milk. When mixed together, the dense curd, fragrant petals, and crisp nuts together create a mellow and sweet taste. As that fragrant milky concoction slips down your throat, it is almost as if you can smell the floral scent from a long time ago.
